item.title: 2021 Reading List
item.description: I noticed that I have been reading books a lot less – and scrolling social media a lot more – so one of my New Year’s resolutions was to read as much as possible. Here’s what I have lined up so far: Career Designing Data Intensive Applications by Martin Kleppmann Zero to One by Peter Thiel Never Split the Difference by Chris Voss Atomic Habits by James Clear Principles of Computer System Design: An Introduction by Jerome H.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Zack ðŸ‘‹ I’m currently working as a software development engineer at Amazon. Previously I worked on: Backend microservices at ThinkData Works, Infrastructure at IBM, Data pipelines and tooling at Geotab I’m a product-focused engineer who enjoys solving challenging problems. When I’m not typing on a keyboard you can find me powerlifting, reading books, or trying out new restaurants.
